title: EP 114: DJ BattleCat: Past Present & Future
itunes:title: EP 114: DJ BattleCat: Past Present & Future
description:
In this episode we have legendary producer “DJ BattleCat” on the concrete couch. We talk about his role in the classic “Bangin On Wax” , his early classic’s and touch on his Rollin 60 Crip affiliation. We then speak on him and Dr. Dre’s 25 year relationship. 

Make sure you follow us on Instagram @thegangsterchroniclespodcast 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
